abstract: Pressing the reset button after a few years it would like to forget, NBC unveiled new dramas and sitcoms to advertiser clients Monday morning.
snippet: Pressing the reset button after a few years it would like to forget, NBC unveiled new dramas and sitcoms to advertiser clients Monday morning.
lead_paragraph: Pressing the reset button after a few years it would like to forget, NBC unveiled a bevy of new dramas and sitcoms to advertiser clients Monday morning. The network impressed the hundreds of assembled media buyers with previews of the high-octane drama “The Event” and the married spy caper “Undercovers,” among others.

headline.main: Upfronts: NBC, Claiming Momentum, Unveils Its New Programs
